sentences.en: In contrast with results from the non - cooperative dynamic game, mutualism could perform better under coordination.
sentences.cn: 与 非 合作动态博弈情况相比,协作情况下互利共生机制能发挥更大的作用.

sentences.en: In this paper, a two - species mutualism model system is discussed.
sentences.cn: 摘要讨论了二种群互惠生物数学模型.

sentences.en: The acacia and its ant army are a textbook example of mutualism between species.
sentences.cn: 洋槐树和它的蚂蚁亲卫队是物种之间互利共生关系的经典范例。

sentences.en: The concept of mutualism effect of hybrid control is proposed based on the biologic symbiosis.
sentences.cn: 借用生物共生概念,提出了协调控制的互利共生效应概念;复合优化和弱势强化效应.

sentences.en: The exchange exemplifies a perfect mutualism.
sentences.cn: 它们的交易是互利共生的绝妙例子.

sentences.en: The fig - pollinator mutualism system is maintained by the reproductive relationships.
sentences.cn: 和榕小蜂共生体系是由宿主和共生者之间的生殖配合维系的.

sentences.en: The mutualism promotes the metabolism of Saccheromyces cerevisiae and its - index number of producing gas.
sentences.cn: 互生培养促进了酵母茵的代谢活性及产气指数.

trans.tran_cn: 互助论，互利共生，互惠共生，共栖
